name: Deep Space Miner
description:
Through the use of a portal, shoot boulders to get ores! Be careful, as there are enemies waiting in the outskirts of space. If you want to fight back, you'll have to upgrade your ship--- and those ores can definitely be sold in the shop. This game was made in 5 days for the Vimjam Game Jam.  NOTE: Make sure not to camp the portal area, as nothing will spawn if you stay there (this was on purpose)

FEATURES

Two Unique Enemies

Ship Upgrades

Weapon Upgrades

Two Shops and Working Currency System

Four Ore Types

GENRE

Shoot em up (SHMUP)

CONTROLS

W or UP arrow key to activate your THRUSTERS

A/S or LEFT/RIGHT arrow keys to ROTATE

SPACEBAR to SHOOT

Tab to toggle the cargo display

Mouse to click the various buttons
